channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

2x mattress

item.title: Outside no 20, 27th October
item.description:
The stakes were installed in the wrong position: they need to be parallel to the street (not perpendicular) for the wind always blows down the street in the same direction. Neighbours have tried to tie back the tree to the stake but it is obviously not a long term solution. This has remained unaddressed for a few weeks now. Thank you
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Carlingford Road, Belsize Park, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: O/s 1446 - 148 Old Road Crayford, 27th October
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Old Road, Crayford, London

item.title: St Esmunds Rd N9, beside hse 107 who is not the offender.Abandoned vehicles- On resident & emergency access way to our gardens & garages Obstructing residents, 27th October
item.description:
